tvorwachs\ClouDNS\Api\RecordsApi::changeRecordStatus

Changes the status of the record to active or inactive

    Signature

    public function changeRecordStatus(string $domain, string $recordId, [integer $status = null] )

    Parameters

    $domain — string
    Domain name to change the status of
    $recordId — string
    Record ID. You can see this ID with the method List records
    $status — integer
    Set to 1, to activate or to 0 to deactivate the record. If omitted the status will be toggled.

    Returns

    array
